name: Stone of the Strike
description: Imbues physical strike with Essence element.
image_prompt: A Common Awakening Stone named Stone of the Strike, inscribed with runes of Melee Attack. Imbues physical strike with Essence element. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Blast
description: Projects a bolt/beam of Essence.
image_prompt: A Common Awakening Stone named Stone of the Blast, inscribed with runes of Ranged Attack. Projects a bolt/beam of Essence. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Shield
description: Creates a barrier or armor buff.
image_prompt: A Common Awakening Stone named Stone of the Shield, inscribed with runes of Defense. Creates a barrier or armor buff. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Trap
description: Places a hidden rune/trigger.
image_prompt: A Uncommon Awakening Stone named Stone of the Trap, inscribed with runes of Area Denial. Places a hidden rune/trigger. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Familiar
description: Spawns an AI minion based on Essence.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Familiar, inscribed with runes of Summoning. Spawns an AI minion based on Essence. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Swarm
description: Splits effect into multiple small projectiles.
image_prompt: A Uncommon Awakening Stone named Stone of the Swarm, inscribed with runes of Multi-Hit. Splits effect into multiple small projectiles. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Feast
description: Drains enemy resource to refill user.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Feast, inscribed with runes of Drain/Sustain. Drains enemy resource to refill user. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Flesh
description: Alters user physiology (Passive/Active).
image_prompt: A Epic Awakening Stone named Stone of the Flesh, inscribed with runes of Body Mod. Alters user physiology (Passive/Active). Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Stars
description: Adds light/cosmic properties or massive buff.
image_prompt: A Epic Awakening Stone named Stone of the Stars, inscribed with runes of Celestial/Augment. Adds light/cosmic properties or massive buff. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Foot
description: Enhances movement or adds teleportation.
image_prompt: A Common Awakening Stone named Stone of the Foot, inscribed with runes of Mobility. Enhances movement or adds teleportation. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Echo
description: Repeats previous action or creates decoy.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Echo, inscribed with runes of Replication. Repeats previous action or creates decoy. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Wall
description: Creates physical obstacles.
image_prompt: A Uncommon Awakening Stone named Stone of the Wall, inscribed with runes of Terrain Control. Creates physical obstacles. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of Focus
description: Enhances sensory data.
image_prompt: A Common Awakening Stone named Stone of Focus, inscribed with runes of Perception. Enhances sensory data. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of Judgment
description: Deals high dmg to low HP/Debuffed targets.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of Judgment, inscribed with runes of Execute. Deals high dmg to low HP/Debuffed targets. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Phantom
description: Grants temporary intangibility or invisibility.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Phantom, inscribed with runes of Evasion. Grants temporary intangibility or invisibility. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Anchor
description: Prevents knockback and increases resistance.
image_prompt: A Uncommon Awakening Stone named Stone of the Anchor, inscribed with runes of Stability. Prevents knockback and increases resistance. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Breath
description: Exhales a cone of Essence.
image_prompt: A Uncommon Awakening Stone named Stone of the Breath, inscribed with runes of Area Attack. Exhales a cone of Essence. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Nova
description: Explodes with Essence energy in all directions.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Nova, inscribed with runes of Area Attack. Explodes with Essence energy in all directions. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Prison
description: Encases the enemy in a structure of Essence.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Prison, inscribed with runes of Terrain Control. Encases the enemy in a structure of Essence. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Lens
description: Allows the user to sense Essence and hidden things.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Lens, inscribed with runes of Perception. Allows the user to sense Essence and hidden things. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Leap
description: Allows the user to jump great distances.
image_prompt: A Common Awakening Stone named Stone of the Leap, inscribed with runes of Mobility. Allows the user to jump great distances. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Void
description: Creates a zone of emptiness that damages enemies.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Void, inscribed with runes of Area Denial. Creates a zone of emptiness that damages enemies. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Shell
description: Summons a hardened carapace around the user.
image_prompt: A Uncommon Awakening Stone named Stone of the Shell, inscribed with runes of Defense. Summons a hardened carapace around the user. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Blink
description: Instantly teleports the user a short distance.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Blink, inscribed with runes of Mobility. Instantly teleports the user a short distance. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Roar
description: Emits a terrifying sound that stuns or fears enemies.
image_prompt: A Uncommon Awakening Stone named Stone of the Roar, inscribed with runes of Control. Emits a terrifying sound that stuns or fears enemies. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Web
description: Creates sticky strands that slow or root targets.
image_prompt: A Common Awakening Stone named Stone of the Web, inscribed with runes of Area Denial. Creates sticky strands that slow or root targets. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Mirror
description: Reflects a portion of incoming damage back to the attacker.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Mirror. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Spore
description: Releases a cloud of choking spores.
image_prompt: A Uncommon Awakening Stone named Stone of the Spore. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Prism
description: Refracts magical energy into multiple beams.
image_prompt: A Rare Awakening Stone named Stone of the Prism. Glowing magical artifact.

name: Stone of the Shatter
description: Shatters the ground or air, causing widespread damage.
image_prompt: A Common Awakening Stone named Stone of the Shatter. Glowing magical artifact.
